channel.description: Recent content in Projects on devboy.org

item.title: devboy/FAKE.Unity3D
item.description:
Collection of common FAKE tasks for Unity3D projects.

github.com/devboy/FAKE.Unity3D

item.title: devboy/Paket.Unity3D
item.description:
An extension for the Paket dependency manager that enables the integration of NuGet dependencies into Unity3D projects.

github.com/devboy/Paket.Unity3D

item.title: fsharp/fake
item.description:
“FAKE - F# Make” is a cropen-source platform build automation system. Due to its integration in F#, all benefits of the .NET Framework and functional programming can be used, including the extensive class library, powerful debuggers and integrated development environments like Visual Studio or MonoDevelop, which provide syntax highlighting and code completion.

The new DSL was designed to be succinct, typed, declarative, extensible and easy to use.

github.com/fsharp/FAKE

item.title: fsprojects/paket
item.description:
A package dependency manager for .NET with support for NuGet packages and GitHub repositories.

github.com/fsprojects/Paket

item.title: wooga/entitas
item.description:
Entitas is an entity-system written in Objective-C. It is very much inspired by existing entity-systems in ActionScript3 like Ash, Ember and XEmber.

github.com/wooga/entitas

item.title: wooga/wooga.lambda
item.description:
Unity3D being so far behind the .NET and Mono world, this library is an attempt at backporting some features found in more recent runtimes and C# libraries as well as pick up and harness useful ideas and patterns from other languages and/or programming paradigms.

github.com/wooga/Wooga.Lambda-CSharp
